name: Love Love Candy
description:
Zoey, Sayaka or Mumu?
Choose your favorite girl and help her with a new phone game called Love Love Candy!

Love Love Candy is a very popular mobile game that seems to be capturing the attention of girls everywhere these days! However, some of them struggle with match-3 games and they need your assistance. If you help them, they might even do something special to express their gratitude!

DRESSING ROOM:
As you progress through the game, you'll unlock various dresses for the girls' avatars. Collect them all and personalize your favorite girl with the dresses of your choice! Each dress provides different items during the match-3 phases, so make sure to unlock as many dresses as possible!

MANY LEVELS:
There are three girls and a total of five levels to complete for each one, resulting in 15 hot scenes to unlock. These scenes feature spicy artworks and voice acting, providing a very exciting experience for players to enjoy!
